===Etymology===
Originally an {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=かぐつち}} compound of {{compound|lang=ja|かぐ|tr1=kagu|pos1=obsolete verb root meaning “to shine, to sparkle”, seen in modern verbs {{ja-l|耀う}} ''kagayou'', {{ja-l|輝く}} ''kagayaku'' “to shine, to sparkle”|つ|tr2=tsu|pos2={{etyl|ojp|-}} possessive particle|ち|tr3=chi|t3=power, life force|pos3=found as root component in terms {{ja-l|命}} ''inochi'' “life”, {{ja-l|力}} ''chikara'' “power, strength”}}.<ref>{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>
